Workshops

  • I will give a two-day workshop on analysis of missing data on 23-24 May 2016 at the Institute of Policy Studies, Lee Kuan Yew School of Public Policy, NUS.
  • I will give two three-day workshops on Multilevel Modeling with R on 15-17 June and on Structural Equation Modeling with R on 25-27 June at Centre for Family and Population Research, FASS, NUS.
